title: Add version-identifier to all files loaded by Admin UI
description:
The Angular UI added a bunch of javascript files to the base html, given that we had some problems w/ users getting cached files in their Brower when using a new release, i suggest we add those identifier (back) for those files as well.

Upayavira mind looking if i missed a reference?

comments.author: Upayavira
comments.content: Stefan Matheis (steffkes) absolutely no objection - go for it!

comments.author: Upayavira
comments.content: You will probably want to include the 'partials' files which are listed in solr/webapp/web/js/angular/app.js.
